children.name: politics
children.definition: ] ideas and activities relating to gaining and using power in a country, city etc: chính trị
examples: Maria is very interested in politics and current affairs.
go into politics/enter politics[begin to work or be active in politics] tham gia chính trị
He made the decision to go into politics last year.
British/ French/ American etc politics
The University runs a course in American politics and government.
party politics[politics involving official political organizations that compete against each other in order to gain power]
Most of the people questioned thought that unions should not get involved in party politics.
local politics[politics in one part of a country]
Thomson has always been deeply involved in local politics.
the world of politics
an important figure in the world of politics.

children.name: be in politics/ be involved in politics
examples: She’s been in politics for over twenty years.

children.name: political
children.definition: connected with the government of a country or local area:
examples: The people are demanding political change.
She began her political career as a city councillor.
He asked me to explain the British political system.
Education is back at the top of the politicalagenda(= the matters that the government is considering) .
political party[an organization with particular opinions that tries to gain power in a country]
There are two main political parties in the US.
political animal[sb who enjoys being involved in politics]
McEnroe loves the atmosphere at Westminster - he’s a real political animal.
politically[adv] [C1]về mặt chính trị
to be politically naive

children.name: a country or system of government in which people have freedom
liberal
children.definition: a liberal society or system is one in which people have the right to express their own opinions, live their own way of life, have their own religious beliefs etc, even if these are different from those of most other people : tự do
examples: In the 1840s, President Herrera promoted a policy of gradual liberal reform in Mexico.

children.name: liberal state/ society/ democracy etc
examples: In a liberal society you may have the right to express your own beliefs, but not necessarily to cause offence to other people.

children.name: free
children.definition: a free country, political system, or society is one in which people are allowed to live their lives in the way that they choose, express their opinions freely, take part in political activity etc:
examples: We will continue our struggle until our country is free.
They were able to return to visit their family in a free Czech Republic.
Sometimes you realize how lucky you are to live in a free society.

children.name: radical
children.definition: believing or expressing the belief that there should be great or extreme social or political change : cấp tiến
examples: He was known as a radical reformer/thinker/politician.
These people have very radical views.

children.name: capitalism
children.definition: an economic, political and social system based on private ownership of property, business and industry, and directed towards making the greatest possible profits for successful organizations and people :chủ nghĩa tư bản
examples: capitalist/ capitalistic[adj] [C2]based on the system of capitalism : tư bản, tư bản chủ nghĩa
a capitalist economy/country
capitalist[C noun] sb who supports capitalism:nhà tư bản

children.name: socialism
children.definition: the set of beliefs that states that all people are equal and should share equally in a country's money : chủ nghĩa xã hội
examples: socialism[U noun] [C2]
the political systems based on these beliefs : chủ nghĩa xã hội
socialist[C noun][adj]
He was a socialist all his life.
socialist policies

children.name: communism
children.definition: /Communism the set of beliefs that the government controls the production of all food and goods, and there is no privately owned property : chủ nghĩa cộng sản
examples: communism/Communism[U noun] the political systems based on these beliefs : chủ nghĩa cộng sản
communist/Communist[C noun] [adj]người cộng sản/ thuộc cộng sản
the Communist Party
communist ideology
Was she ever a Communist?
